name: Hyperliquid
notes: Hyperliquid docs describe REST market data endpoints; execution requires router interaction on HyperEVM.

name: Project X
notes: Public liquidity launch coverage confirms Project X DEX availability on HyperEVM; direct API references still pending.

name: HyperSwap
notes: Gitbook documents router contracts, WHYPE token address, and pool deployment details.

name: Hybra
notes: Foundation site outlines AMM architecture but lacks published SDK; follow on social channels for router updates.

name: Upheaval Finance
notes: Governance portal hosts roadmap for Upheaval AMM; technical API docs not yet released.

name: Kittenswap Finance
notes: Repository provides router ABI and deployment scripts; REST quote endpoint pending.

name: Curve Finance
notes: curve-js SDK supports multi-chain pool queries; HTTP pricing available via Curve Router API.

name: Gliquid
notes: Project site confirms HyperEVM deployment in progress; awaiting router specification.

name: Drip.Trade
notes: Analytics dashboards track DRIP pairs but no public router docs yet.

name: HyperBrick
notes: Gitbook lists pool factories and admin addresses; quote path TBD.

name: HX Finance
notes: Hyperliquid Pro announcement confirms HX Finance launch; awaiting API documentation.

name: Hypertrade
notes: Aggregator API returns executable calldata and route splits for HyperEVM swaps.

name: 1inch
notes: Use Swap API v6 for quotes; requires API key via dashboard.

name: 0x
notes: Public Swap API v1 returns price and gas estimates; API key optional for rate limits.

name: Odos
notes: SOR API supports POST /sor/quote for multi-hop aggregation.

name: ParaSwap
notes: Price API returns transaction data and price impact; requires optional API key for higher throughput.
